targets.rawSql:
WITH accounts AS (SELECT oid AS "Account Id", name AS "Account" FROM entity WHERE type='BUSINESS_ACCOUNT'
     ), rgroups AS (SELECT "Account Id", "Account", e.oid AS resource_group_id, e.name as "Resource Group"
         FROM accounts, entity e,
         scope_to($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), 'RESOURCE_GROUP', ARRAY["Account Id"], false) AS s
         WHERE s.oid = e.oid
     ),  nonrgaccounts AS (SELECT accounts."Account Id", Accounts."Account" from accounts EXCEPT  (SELECT "Account Id", "Account" from rgroups)
     ), entities AS (SELECT DISTINCT "Account Id", "Account", resource_group_id, "Resource Group", e.oid AS "Entity Id", e.name AS "Entity Name", e.type AS "Entity Type", string_agg(elem, ', ') AS entity_tags
         FROM rgroups, entity e,
         scope_to_types($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), ARRAY['VIRTUAL_MACHINE','VIRTUAL_VOLUME', 'DATABASE', 'DATABASE_SERVER']::entity_type[], ARRAY[resource_group_id], false) AS s
         cross join lateral jsonb_extract_path_text(e.attrs::jsonb, 'tags') As elem
         WHERE s.oid = e.oid
         GROUP BY 1,2,3,4, 5, 6
         
         
), nonrgentities AS (SELECT DISTINCT "Account Id", "Account", ''::text AS resource_group_id, ''::text AS "Resource Group", e.oid AS "Entity Id", e.name AS "Entity Name", e.type AS "Entity Type", string_agg(elem, ', ') AS entity_tags
         FROM nonrgaccounts, entity e,
         scope_to_types($__timeFrom(), $__timeTo(), ARRAY['VIRTUAL_MACHINE','VIRTUAL_VOLUME', 'DATABASE', 'DATABASE_SERVER']::entity_type[], ARRAY[nonrgaccounts."Account Id"], false) AS s
         cross join lateral jsonb_extract_path_text(e.attrs::jsonb, 'tags') As elem
         WHERE s.oid = e.oid
         GROUP BY 1,2,3,4, 5, 6
)

(SELECT  "Entity Id", "Entity Name", "Entity Type", COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'MISSED_SAVINGS'), 0) AS "Missed Savings ($)",
  COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'MISSED_INVESTMENTS'), 0) AS "Missed Investments ($)", COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'REALIZED_SAVINGS'), 0) AS "Realized Savings ($)",
  COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'REALIZED_INVESTMENTS'), 0) AS "Realized Investments ($)", "Account", "Resource Group",  regexp_replace(entity_tags, '{|[|"\[\]]|}'::text, ''::text, 'g') AS Tags
    FROM entity_savings es, entities
    WHERE es.entity_oid = entities."Entity Id"
    AND time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 8, 9, 10 ORDER BY 1) 
    
    UNION
    
    (SELECT  "Entity Id", "Entity Name", "Entity Type", COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'MISSED_SAVINGS'), 0) AS "Missed Savings ($)",
  COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'MISSED_INVESTMENTS'), 0) AS "Missed Investments ($)", COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'REALIZED_SAVINGS'), 0) AS "Realized Savings ($)",
  COALESCE(sum(stats_value) FILTER (WHERE savings_type = 'REALIZED_INVESTMENTS'), 0) AS "Realized Investments ($)", "Account", "Resource Group",  regexp_replace(entity_tags, '{|[|"\[\]]|}'::text, ''::text, 'g') AS Tags
    FROM entity_savings es, nonrgentities
    WHERE es.entity_oid = nonrgentities."Entity Id"
    AND time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3, 8, 9, 10 ORDER BY 1);
